channel.title: CVE Feed for North Grid Corporation -- Proself Enterprise/Standard Edition
channel.description: The latest CVEs for North Grid Corporation -- Proself Enterprise/Standard Edition

item.title: CVE-2023-39415|2024-08-02T18:10:20.423Z -- north%20grid%20corporation -- proself%20enterprise%2Fstandard%20edition
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Proself Enterprise/Standard Edition Ver5.61 and earlier, Proself Gateway Edition Ver1.62 and earlier, and Proself Mail Sanitize Edition Ver1.07 and earlier allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to log in to the product's Control Panel and perform an unintended operation.

item.title: CVE-2023-39416|2024-08-02T18:10:20.822Z -- north%20grid%20corporation -- proself%20enterprise%2Fstandard%20edition
item.description: Proself Enterprise/Standard Edition Ver5.61 and earlier, Proself Gateway Edition Ver1.62 and earlier, and Proself Mail Sanitize Edition Ver1.07 and earlier allow a remote authenticated attacker with an administrative privilege to execute arbitrary OS commands.

item.title: CVE-2023-45727|2024-08-02T20:29:32.421Z -- north%20grid%20corporation -- proself%20enterprise%2Fstandard%20edition
item.description: Proself Enterprise/Standard Edition Ver5.62 and earlier, Proself Gateway Edition Ver1.65 and earlier, and Proself Mail Sanitize Edition Ver1.08 and earlier allow a remote unauthenticated attacker to conduct XML External Entity (XXE) attacks. By processing a specially crafted request containing malformed XML data, arbitrary files on the server containing account information may be read by the attacker.
